results.title: Utility of support vector machine and decision tree to identify the prognosis of metformin poisoning in the United States: analysis of National Poisoning Data System
results.text_hl: We believe that this @DISEASE_Hypovolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D020896 @@@hypovolemia@@@ might cause @DISEASE_Hypotension @DISEASE_MESH:D007022 @@@hypotension@@@ and compensatory @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ exposure can also reduce @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ absorption, lower hepatic @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ synthesis, and induce @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@.

citations.NLM: Mehrpour O, Saeedi F, Hoyte C, Goss F, Shirazi FM. Utility of support vector machine and decision tree to identify the prognosis of metformin poisoning in the United States: analysis of National Poisoning Data System BMC Pharmacol Toxicol. 2022 Jul 13;23(1):49. PMID: 35831909
citations.BibTeX: @article{35831909, title={Utility of support vector machine and decision tree to identify the prognosis of metformin poisoning in the United States: analysis of National Poisoning Data System}, author={Mehrpour O and Saeedi F and Hoyte C and Goss F and Shirazi FM}, journal={BMC Pharmacol Toxicol}, volume={23}, number={1}, pages={49}}

results.title: Metformin therapy confers cardioprotection against the remodeling of gap junction in tachycardia-induced atrial fibrillation dog model.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ therapy confers cardioprotection against the remodeling of gap junction in @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@-induced @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@atrial fibrillation@@@ @SPECIES_9615 @@@dog@@@ model.

citations.NLM: Li J, Li B, Bai F, Ma Y, Liu N, Liu Y, Wang Y, Liu Q. Metformin therapy confers cardioprotection against the remodeling of gap junction in tachycardia-induced atrial fibrillation dog model. Life Sci. 2020 Aug 1;254():117759. PMID: 32389830

results.title: Successful treatment of severe lactic acidosis caused by a suicide attempt with a metformin overdose.
results.text_hl: Here, we report a 43-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ and @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@chronic renal insufficiency@@@ who developed @DISEASE_Hypoglycemia @DISEASE_MESH:D007003 @@@hypoglycemia@@@, @DISEASE_Hypothermia @DISEASE_MESH:D007035 @@@hypothermia@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ and @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ after a suicide attempt with a @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ @DISEASE_Drug_Overdose @DISEASE_MESH:D062787 @@@overdose@@@.

citations.NLM: Yang PW, Lin KH, Lo SH, Wang LM, Lin HD. Successful treatment of severe lactic acidosis caused by a suicide attempt with a metformin overdose. Kaohsiung J Med Sci. 2009 Feb;25(2):93-7. PMID: 19321413

results.title: Effects of adrenergic, cholinergic and ganglionic blockade on acute depressor responses to metformin in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: In SHRs, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ elicited depressor responses accompanied by @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013610 @@@tachycardia@@@ (100 mg/kg; delta MAP, -26 +/- 3 mm Hg; delta HR, +49 +/- 12 bpm).

citations.NLM: Muntzel MS, Abe A, Petersen JS. Effects of adrenergic, cholinergic and ganglionic blockade on acute depressor responses to metformin in spontaneously hypertensive rats. J Pharmacol Exp Ther. 1997 May;281(2):618-23. PMID: 9152364
